page.description: The UI_BROWSE_FOR_COMPUTER() function allows you to browse for and select the name of a computer on your network using the standard Windows dialog. The function enables the OK button only if you select a valid computer name.
page.syntax: Computer_Name as C = UI_BROWSE_FOR_COMPUTER([C DisplayText [, L ShowEditBox]])

argument.name: Computer_Name
argument.description: The name of the selected computer.

argument.name: DisplayText
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The prompt that appears below the window title. Character

page.example: ? ui_browse_for_computer("Select a Computer and Click OK") = "OurServer"
